title: Brazil’s Finance Chief Backs Central Bank Oversight of Investment Funds
description: Brazil’s finance chief called for giving the central bank authority to regulate investment funds, arguing the move would strengthen oversight of the financial system following the liquidation of troubled Banco Master SA.
content: Brazil’s finance chief called for giving the central bank authority to regulate investment funds, arguing the move would strengthen oversight of the financial system following the liquidation of troubled Banco Master SA.
